name: PR_EST_FAC_FEES
description: The facility fees information for the price estimate. Facility fees are generated in Resolute Hospital Billing.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Category to indicate which type of code (DRG/ICD/CPT) was used when preparing the estimate.

columns.name: DRG_CODE_ID
columns.description: Contains the DRG code upon which the estimate for the facility fees is based.

columns.name: DRG_CODE_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: ICD_CODE_ID
columns.description: The ICD code upon which the estimate for the facility fees is based.

columns.name: ICD_CODE_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: CPT_CODE
columns.description: Stores the CPT code upon which the hospital fees estimate is based.

columns.name: LOCATION_ID
columns.description: Location for this facility fee estimate.

columns.name: ACCT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Account class for this facility fee estimate.

columns.name: BILLED_AMT
columns.description: Estimated charge amount for an Hospital Billing (HB)ï¿½historical case estimate.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The estimated allowed amount for the facility fees.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_AMT
columns.description: The estimated self-pay amount for the facility fees.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The benefit service type used to determine benefit information for the facility fees section.  This information comes from the benefit record attached to the estimate. Use the PR_EST_INFO table, BENEFITS_INFO_ID column to link this data.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DISCOUNT_AMT
columns.description: The estimated discount amount for the facility fees.

columns.name: SYSTEM_DISCOUNT_AMT
columns.description: The system-calculated discount amount for the facility fees.

columns.name: SYS_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The system-calculated charge amount for a Hospital Billing (HB) historical case estimate.

columns.name: SYS_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The system-calculated allowed amount for a Hospital Billing (HB) historical case estimate.

columns.name: HB_PROV_ID
columns.description: Provider for this facility fee estimate.

columns.name: HB_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: Department for this facility fee estimate.

columns.name: BASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Base class for this facility fee estimate.

columns.name: HB_MEDIAN_CHARGES
columns.description: Median charge amount from historical cases.

columns.name: HB_MEDIAN_ALLOWED
columns.description: Median allowed amount from historical cases.

columns.name: HB_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The reimbursement contract calculated for a Hospital Billing context.

columns.name: HB_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: HB_OVRIDE_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The reimbursement contract manually selected to find historical data in a Hospital Billing context.

columns.name: HB_OVRIDE_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: HB_OVRIDE_BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The plan manually selected to find historical data in a Hospital Billing context.

columns.name: HB_OVRIDE_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The payor manually selected to find historical data in a Hospital Billing context.

columns.name: HB_OVRIDE_FIN_CL_C_NAME
columns.description: The financial class category ID in an Hospital Billing context for the patient estimate.
entries: Sent to Consolidated Self-Pay Service Area

columns.name: FAC_ADDL_LINE
columns.description: This item holds a line number in the PR_EST_ADDL_INFO table, which stores additional information about the charge line.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_DISCNT_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The reimbursement discount contract calculated as part of a self-pay discount.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_DISCNT_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_DISCNT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The plan used to generate the simulated claim for discount calculation.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_DISCNT_SCOPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Scope used to find median case for self-pay discount by contract calculation.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_DISCNT_MEDIAN_AMT
columns.description: Median contractual amount to apply as part of a self-pay discount.

columns.name: REPRESENT_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The representative Hospital Account used during the calculation of the context line. For HB Case contexts, the historical median Hospital Account used to calculate amounts will be saved. For HB Procedure contexts, the representative Hospital Account used to create a simulated claim will be saved. This item does not store the Hospital Account used to find related procedure information.
